Html:
Hi!
I just downloaded the documentation, but wasn't able to open it. Could you tell me what document type it is?

It is a compiled HTML help file.

If you are running XP SP 2 depending on your security settings you may have to right click the file after downloading, select properties and on the General tab press Unblock.

SP 2 blocks many files that can execute in some way if they are downloaded from the Internet.

Let me know if this does not take care of your issue.

Thanks

Ah, thanks for the reply. The problem i had was, that the file didn't have the .chm-ending. It was just "Ascend.NET". Renamed it to "Ascend.NET.chm" and I can use it.
Thanks again :)
